author: sascha
msg: Use always ap_signal() in APR to avoid redefining the system call signal()

author: sascha
msg: Remove trailing slash, confuses some makes

author: rbb
msg: Fix a nasty little bug that was causing a seg fault everytime we tried
starting Apache with an existing pid file.  When APR allocates space, it
has to allocate the right amount.

author: rbb
msg: Add a flag to ap_open to allow close on delete status.  This should be the
preferred way to delete a file after closing it, rather than unlinking the
file immediately after opening it.  This is more portable, and was can code
this option to work on all platforms, the unlink option is not always
